title: Jon Hopkins - Opalescent [2001] [FLAC - OGG - MP3]
description:
**********************   Jon Hopkins : Opalescent (2001)   *********************


Pick and choose between two different rips:

* Grouped Tracks : If your player doesn't support gapless playback, 
  you'll probably prefer these since several tracks in the album are 
  joined together.

* Individual Tracks : As they come on the CD.


And three file formats:

* FLAC (lossless audio)

* MP3 VBR ~128 kbps

* OGG Vorbis Q6 (~256 kbps)

All properly tagged, album art provided.
